data.text: @colorofresil 3- Take care. Sorry if I wasn’t clear. That’s MY fault.

@colorofresil 2- Told me his mom said he was a good kid, then either after a surgery or a fall, his personality changed. 
He was kind at 1st then the other personality made itself known more freq. He called it his “protection”.

@colorofresil Heck no. How’d u get that idea? I can’t/wouldn’t evaluate you.

My sis & last bf both were. He’d fly into these rages at the drop of a hat. Road rage. Was always “miserable”. Stopped speaking to ppl for days or wks. Once mentioned something abt hearing voices. It was terrifying.
@F4Aircraft Are you saying I'm a narcissist?

@colorofresil Con’t

U can even say something like, I’m not sure if u exist or not…if that makes u more comfortable.

Eph 6:12 explains that we’re not in a battle with ppl, but w a spirit. Ex:A person who is very angry for no reason, there r usually spiritual strings being pulled there.
Cont
@F4Aircraft No I am not religious and do not read the bible.
